issue.title: [Rust][Parquet] Allow reader buffer size to be specified
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9663](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9663). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When creating a SerializedFileReader, there is no ability to specify the capacity of the internal BufReader. I would like to be able to specify the buffer capacity so that I can tune performance.
